attributes.action: The People Voted to Leave DELIVER BREXIT NOW
attributes.additional_details:
We, the constituents of this country believe that those in power think  we are weak and can be ignored, well this is not so, the next elections should be very interesting after this fiasco.  In the news everyday we watch as politicians talk about how disregard our vote, they do not want to start any case law that could impact on other votes.  They make themselves a laughing stock throughout the world, we are not fools.
We want to leave now .. without a deal or not...……
attributes.background: We, the people of Britain, voted to leave the EU in the Referendum, and since then the politicians have done nothing but squabble and bicker over how to change what we decided by blocking the PMs efforts to deliver for the people who are waiting for their decision to be honoured!!
